participant_1.background:
I play the guitar and sing as a way to relax and express myself.
I'm not married, but I have been playing video games with my kids since they were little.
i am entering the police academy this summer.
i love to recycle.
and also love drawing.

participant_2.background:
On the weekend, I enjoy relaxing in my recliner after a long week of work.
i hope one day to own a stable of at least 10 race horses.
i love to run fast.
I'm a great storyteller, and I use that to make friends and get to know my family.
My clumsy ways will be met with criticism from others, but my dog will always be there for me.

content.text: Hey there, hope you are having a wonderful day!
I am, thank you! How about you?
I am also doing well. I am about to enter the police academy this summer, which I am really excited about.
Wow, that is great! I am sure you will be a great officer!
Thank you, I appreciate that! I play the guitar and sing as a way to relax and express myself.
That is awesome! I love to sing too, but I am not very good at it.
It is just for fun. I have been playing since I was little, so it is pretty easy for me now.
That is great. I have always wanted to learn how to play an instrument.
You should definitely try! It is a lot of fun.
I think I will. I have always wanted to play the guitar.
That is great! I am sure you will be great at it.
